Package org.apache.kafka.clients.admin

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractOptions<T extends AbstractOptions>  
    AdminClient
    The administrative client for Kafka, which supports managing and inspecting topics, brokers, configurations and ACLs.
    AdminClientConfig
    The AdminClient configuration class, which also contains constants for configuration entry names.
    AlterConfigsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.alterConfigs(Map).
    AlterConfigsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.alterConfigs(Map) call.
    AlterReplicaLogDirsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.alterReplicaLogDirs(Map, AlterReplicaLogDirsOptions).
    AlterReplicaLogDirsResult
    The result of AdminClient.alterReplicaLogDirs(Map, AlterReplicaLogDirsOptions).
    Config
    A configuration object containing the configuration entries for a resource.
    ConfigEntry
    A class representing a configuration entry containing name, value and additional metadata.
    CreateAclsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.createAcls(Collection).
    CreateAclsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.createAcls(Collection) call.
    CreatePartitionsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.createPartitions(Map).
    CreatePartitionsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.createPartitions(Map) call.
    CreateTopicsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.createTopics(Collection).
    CreateTopicsResult
    The result of AdminClient.createTopics(Collection).
    DeleteAclsOptions
    Options for the AdminClient.deleteAcls(Collection) call.
    DeleteAclsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.deleteAcls(Collection) call.
    DeleteAclsResult.FilterResult
    A class containing either the deleted ACL binding or an exception if the delete failed.
    DeleteAclsResult.FilterResults
    A class containing the results of the delete ACLs operation.
    DeleteTopicsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.deleteTopics(Collection).
    DeleteTopicsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.deleteTopics(Collection) call.
    DescribeAclsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.describeAcls(AclBindingFilter).
    DescribeAclsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.describeAcls(AclBindingFilter) call.
    DescribeClusterOptions
    Options for AdminClient.describeCluster().
    DescribeClusterResult
    The result of the AdminClient.describeCluster() call.
    DescribeConfigsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.describeConfigs(Collection).
    DescribeConfigsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.describeConfigs(Collection) call.
    DescribeLogDirsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.describeLogDirs(Collection) The API of this class is evolving, see AdminClient for details.
    DescribeLogDirsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.describeLogDirs(Collection) call.
    DescribeReplicaLogDirsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.describeReplicaLogDirs(Collection).
    DescribeReplicaLogDirsResult
    The result of AdminClient.describeReplicaLogDirs(Collection).
    DescribeReplicaLogDirsResult.ReplicaLogDirInfo  
    DescribeTopicsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.describeTopics(Collection).
    DescribeTopicsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.describeTopics(Collection) call.
    KafkaAdminClient
    The default implementation of AdminClient.
    ListTopicsOptions
    Options for AdminClient.listTopics().
    ListTopicsResult
    The result of the AdminClient.listTopics() call.
    NewPartitions
    Describes new partitions for a particular topic in a call to AdminClient.createPartitions(Map).
    NewTopic
    A new topic to be created via AdminClient.createTopics(Collection).
    TopicDescription
    A detailed description of a single topic in the cluster.
    TopicListing
    A listing of a topic in the cluster.
